class.name: Phaser.PluginManager

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: A reference to the currently running game.

class.help: The Plugin Manager is responsible for the loading, running and unloading of Phaser Plugins.

public.name: add

returns.help: The Plugin that was added to the manager.

public.help: Add a new Plugin into the PluginManager.\nThe Plugin must have 2 properties: game and parent. Plugin.game is set to the game reference the PluginManager uses, and parent is set to the PluginManager.

parameters.name: plugin
parameters.help: The Plugin to add into the PluginManager. This can be a function or an existing object.

parameters.name: parameter
parameters.help: Additional parameters that will be passed to the Plugin.init method.

public.name: destroy
public.help: Clear down this PluginManager, calls destroy on every plugin and nulls out references.

public.name: postRender
public.help: Post-render is called after the Game Renderer and State.render have run.\nIt only calls plugins who have visible=true.

public.name: postUpdate
public.help: PostUpdate is the last thing to be called before the world render.\nIn particular, it is called after the world postUpdate, which means the camera has been adjusted.\nIt only calls plugins who have active=true.

public.name: preUpdate
public.help: Pre-update is called at the very start of the update cycle, before any other subsystems have been updated (including Physics).\nIt only calls plugins who have active=true.

public.name: remove
public.help: Remove a Plugin from the PluginManager. It calls Plugin.destroy on the plugin before removing it from the manager.

public.name: removeAll
public.help: Remove all Plugins from the PluginManager. It calls Plugin.destroy on every plugin before removing it from the manager.

public.name: render
public.help: Render is called right after the Game Renderer completes, but before the State.render.\nIt only calls plugins who have visible=true.

public.name: update
public.help: Update is called after all the core subsystems (Input, Tweens, Sound, etc) and the State have updated, but before the render.\nIt only calls plugins who have active=true.

public.name: game
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the currently running game.

public.name: plugins
public.inlineHelp: An array of all the plugins being managed by this PluginManager.
